title: Meta shares jump after strong third-quarter sales forecast
description: Meta’s results show that the social media company’s advertising business is still growing fast enough to support aggressive spending on artificial intelligence.
content: Meta Platforms topped projections for second-quarter sales and gave a stronger-than-expected forecast for the current period, a sign that the social media company’s advertising business is still growing quickly enough to support aggressive spending o... [368 chars]

title: Microsoft's Azure Cloud Surges with AI Power Play
description: Microsoft's Azure cloud-computing business reported impressive growth, surpassing expectations with annual sales exceeding $75 billion. The company's strategic investment in artificial intelligence has fueled this success. Despite concerns over its partnership with OpenAI, Microsoft continues to innovate with in-house AI technologies and partnerships to maintain its competitive edge.
content: Microsoft's Azure cloud-computing division has delivered a notable performance, surpassing Wall Street expectations with annual sales exceeding $75 billion. This marks the first time Microsoft has disclosed sales figures of this magnitude, showcasing... [711 chars]

title: Meta stock surges after Q2 results blow past expectations despite heavy AI spending
description: In the midst of an artificial intelligence spending spree, Meta posted stronger-than-expected results for the second quarter, buoyed by growing ad revenue even as its expenses increased.

title: Artificial intelligence cost tech workers their jobs?

title: The grave danger the SONA missed: Nuclear war
description: DOOMSDAY Clock is a yearly assessment by the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists, founded in 1945 by Albert Einstein, atom bomb developer J. Robert Oppenheimer and University of Chicago scientists. Every January, the Clock warns how close humanity is to calamitous destruction from major threats to our existence, including nuclear weapons, climate change, infectious diseases and misuse of new technologies like artificial intelligence (AI) in arms development and military action.
content: DOOMSDAY Clock is a yearly assessment by the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists, founded in 1945 by Albert Einstein, atom bomb developer J. Robert Oppenheimer and University of Chicago scientists. Every January, the Clock warns how close humanity is t... [6671 chars]

title: AI, robotics lead Japan’s food security effort
description: “SUMATO aguri,” or “smart agriculture” in Japan, is entering a new phase of productivity. Moving forward from mechanization, it is shifting into automation, using drones, robotics, and enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) applications in the planting cycle.
content: “SUMATO aguri,” or “smart agriculture” in Japan, is entering a new phase of productivity. Moving forward from mechanization, it is shifting into automation, using drones, robotics, and enhanced artificial intelligence (AI) applications in the plantin... [5533 chars]

title: Zuckerberg says AI superintelligence is 'in sight,' touts 'new era of personal empowerment'
description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said Wednesday that the creation of superintelligent artificial intelligence is “now in sight” and that it will herald a “new era of personal empowerment.”Zuckerberg said that Meta’s approach will be “different from others in the industry” because it will focus on developing AI superintelligence to benefit people’s personal life, rather than directing AI to automate work — a rising concern as more and more companies move to replace entry-level roles with AI.
content:

title: I co-parent with ChatGPT - I love turning off my brain and letting AI help raise my child
description: Mom Lilian Schmidt, 33, living in Switzerland, says she turned ChatGPT into a co-parent for herself and her partner, training the artificial intelligence to give her detailed tips on meal planning, bedtime routines, preparing for birthdays and vacations, and more.
content:
She’s tech-ing a break from burnout.
Even with an in-person partner, Lilian Schmidt was sick of shouldering the mental load of motherhood.
So, she’s trained ChatGPT to become a second mommy — tasking it to draft shopping lists, create meal plans, pla... [6442 chars]

title: Morgan Stanley raises Nvidia price target on ‘exceptional’ AI strength
description: Analyst Joseph Moore, who reiterated his overweight rating on the artificial intelligence chip darling, upped his price target on the stock.
